p.d: Looking for more detailed information about martial arts? This documentary style program gives you the inside scoop on what it takes to be a champion in any number of disciplines. In this edition of “Beyond MMA” Steve Mills, owner of “Five Points Academy” in New York City discusses the sport of Muay Thai, it’s history, traditions and culture in great detail. Find out why “The Science of Eight Limbs” is an essential part of any mixed martial arts competitor’s background.
